description: Borscht is one of the most famous Ukrainian dishes, a vibrant and hearty beet and potato soup perfect for colder days.
keywords: Soup,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Hearty Beet & Potato Borscht Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes
2L chicken stock, made with 2 stock cubes
1 medium red capsicum, cored and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the olive oil in a large, deep pot and tip in the grated beetroot. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring, to soften. Pour over the chicken stock and add the potatoes and carrots. Cook for 10-12 minutes until tender.

Heat the rest of the oil in a large non-stick pan and cook the onions, celery and capsicum for 8-10 minutes to soften. Stir in the garlic and tomato paste and cook for 1 minute. Pour this mixture into the soup pot and stir well.
Stir in the dill, cook for 2-3 minutes and serve with a dollop of sour cream on top.
